statements: SELECT * FROM competitor_data;
SELECT competitor_name, brand_performance FROM competitor_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT competitor_name, brand_performance FROM competitor_data WHERE brand_performance > 0.8;
SELECT competitor_name, brand_performance, marketing_strategy_adjustments FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, competitor_name FROM competitor_data ORDER BY competitor_name DESC, brand_performance ASC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data ORDER BY competitor_name DESC, brand_performance ASC
SELECT competitor_name, brand_performance FROM competitor_data WHERE brand_performance > 0.5 ORDER BY brand_performance DESC
SELECT competitor_name, brand_performance FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_name LIKE 'A%' OR competitor_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY competitor_name
SELECT competitor_name, brand_performance FROM competitor_data WHERE brand_performance BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY competitor_name
SELECT competitor_name, marketing_strategy_adjustments FROM competitor_data WHERE LENGTH(marketing_strategy_adjustments) > 50 ORDER BY competitor_name
SELECT * FROM competitors
SELECT name, revenue, employees FROM competitors WHERE revenue > 100000
SELECT name, industry FROM competitors ORDER BY industry ASC
SELECT id, name, revenue FROM competitors WHERE employees >= 500 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, AVG(employees) AS avg_employees FROM competitors
SELECT * FROM competitors WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT name, revenue FROM competitors WHERE industry = 'Healthcare' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM brand_performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY revenue DESC, impressions ASC;
SELECT brand_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM brand_performance GROUP BY brand_id HAVING total_revenue > 10000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT competitors.name, brand_performance.revenue FROM competitors INNER JOIN brand_performance ON competitors.id = brand_performance.brand_id WHERE brand_performance.date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM competitor_data ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT brand_name, performance_score FROM brand_performance WHERE performance_score > 8;
SELECT competitor_name, market_share FROM competitor_data WHERE market_share < 0.1;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, effectiveness_rating FROM marketing_strategy WHERE effectiveness_rating BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data WHERE revenue > 50000 ORDER BY revenue DESC, market_share ASC;
SELECT competitor_name, revenue, market_share FROM competitor_data WHERE revenue > 100000 ORDER BY competitor_name DESC;
SELECT brand_name, performance_score, performance_date FROM brand_performance WHERE performance_score > 8 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, effectiveness_rating FROM marketing_strategy WHERE effectiveness_rating > 0.8 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT competitor_name, market_share, revenue FROM competitor_data WHERE market_share < 0.3 ORDER BY revenue DESC, market_share ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, effectiveness_rating FROM marketing_strategy WHERE target_audience LIKE '%online%' ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data
SELECT competitor_name, value FROM competitor_data WHERE value > 100
SELECT data_type, competitor_name, value FROM competitor_data WHERE data_type = 'sales' ORDER BY competitor_name ASC
SELECT * FROM brand_performance WHERE performance_metric = 'ROI' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT brand_name, performance_metric, TIMESTAMP FROM brand_performance WHERE value < 0.5
SELECT * FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_name = 'Company A';
SELECT id, competitor_name, value FROM competitor_data WHERE value > 1000 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT brand_name, performance_metric, timestamp FROM brand_performance WHERE brand_name = 'Brand X';
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, budget FROM marketing_strategy WHERE budget < 5000;
SELECT adjustment_type, impact_metric, timestamp, description FROM strategy_adjustments;
SELECT * FROM competitors;
SELECT id, name, industry FROM competitors WHERE reputation > 80;
SELECT brand_id, date, revenue FROM brand_metrics ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_id, platform, followers FROM social_media_data WHERE followers > 10000 ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitors WHERE reputation > 75;
SELECT name, industry, website FROM competitors WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT brand_id, date, revenue, market_share FROM brand_metrics ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT brand_id, platform, followers, engagement_rate FROM social_media_data WHERE followers > 100000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
